casebody.data:
ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENT LEGAL INSTITUTE, et al., petitioners,
v.
Joshua EPEL, et al. No. 15-471. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 7, 2015.

Motion of Pacific Legal Foundation, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Association des Eleveurs de Canards et d'Oies du Quebec, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
